programme.title: The Millionaire Chase
programme.desc: A nightclub owner (Peter Chen Ho) has his way with three sisters while gallivanting across Asia. Also starring Lily Ho, Chin Ping.

programme.title: A Taste of Cold Steel
programme.desc: It's a no-holds-barred battle to the death for possession of the invaluable Purple Sword, as the Five Tigers take this adventure to the outer limits.

programme.title: Dawn Will Come

programme.title: Heroes of Sung
programme.desc: In this period action film, Meng Hung (Shih Szu) must work with Fan Tien-Fu (Lo Lieh) to protect the royal seals of the Sung Dynasty.

programme.title: How to Pick Girls up !
programme.desc: A self-proclaimed love expert leads a hapless loser in lover on a series of loopy excursions into the wild world of modern love!

programme.title: Temple of the Red Lotus
programme.desc: When the family that a man named Wu (Jimmy Wang Yu) marries into comes under repeated attack, he suspects that his in-laws are bandits.

programme.title: Lovers Blades

programme.title: Little Dragon Maiden
programme.desc: The old and the new were mixed together to create a far-out period action love story.

programme.title: Girl With the Diamond Slipper

programme.title: Secret Service of the Imperial Court
programme.desc: A secret service agent, Chao Pu Fun, must protect the innocent against a power-mad Eunuch.

programme.title: Hotel Soul Good

programme.title: Foolish Plan

programme.title: Cinta Koko Coklat
programme.desc: Damia mula perasan ada sesuatu yang tidak kena dengan Zara apabila nampak dia sering termenung dan runsing. Zara juga sering mual dan muntah serta alah dengan coklat baru keluaran Rich Chocolate.

programme.title: Bepanah Pyaar

programme.title: Abang Sado Boleh Beres
programme.desc: Nina merajuk apabila Rayyan, Rahul and Fariz tidak membantunya di nursery kanak-kanak dek kerana berebut melayan seorang pelanggan wanita cantik. Rozita datang ke gim untuk berkongsi masalahnya.

programme.title: Checklist Mr Right

programme.title: Di Sebalik Kasyaf
